name: Candy Shop Mania: Connect Sweet
description:
Clear two or more same candies to score points, try to match more same candies to make more combos!
It's easy, enjoyable but very challenging!
Candy Shop Mania Features:
- 64 challenging levels and many game props
- Easy to play for all ages
- The Fire props can clear candies in one row
- The Water props can clear candies around
- The Ice props can unfreeze the frozen candies
- Sweet game graphics and cool animation effects
